content.text:
# San Diego Film Critics Society Awards 2024

The 29th San Diego Film Critics Society Awards were announced on December 9, 2024.
The nominations were announced on December 6, 2024, with Dune: Part Two, directed by Denis Villeneuve, leading the nominations with twelve, followed by Conclave and Wicked with nine each, and Sing Sing with eight.
Winners and nominees
Winners will be listed at the top of each list in bold, while the runner-ups and nominees for each category will be listed under them.
{| class=wikitable style="width=100%"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%"| Best Picture
! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%"| Best Director
|-
| valign="top" |
* Sing Sing
** Runner-up: Anora
** Runner-up: Conclave
*** Challengers
*** Dune: Part Two
| valign="top" |
* 'Denis Villeneuve – Dune: Part Two'
** Runner-up: Greg Kwedar – Sing Sing
*** Edward Berger – Conclave
*** Brady Corbet – The Brutalist
*** Coralie Fargeat – The Substance
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%"| Best Actor
! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%"| Best Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Colman Domingo – Sing Sing as John "Divine G" Whitfield'
** Runner-up:  Adrien Brody – The Brutalist as László Tóth
** Runner-up:  Daniel Craig – Queer as William Lee
*** Timothée Chalamet – A Complete Unknown as Bob Dylan
*** Ralph Fiennes – Conclave as Thomas Cardinal Lawrence
| valign="top" |
* 'Marianne Jean-Baptiste – Hard Truths as Pansy Deacon'
** Runner-up: Amy Adams – Nightbitch as Mother
*** Cynthia Erivo – Wicked as Elphaba Thropp
*** Mikey Madison – Anora as Anora "Ani" Mikheeva
*** Demi Moore – The Substance as Elisabeth Sparkle

! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%"| Best Supporting Actress

** Runner-up: Denzel Washington – Gladiator II as Macrinus
*** Clarence Maclin – Sing Sing as Clarence "Divine Eye" Maclin
*** Guy Pearce – The Brutalist as Harrison Lee Van Buren, Sr.
*** Stanley Tucci – Conclave as Aldo Cardinal Bellini
| valign="top" |
* 'Ariana Grande – Wicked as Galinda Upland'
** Runner-up: Joan Chen – Dìdi as Chungsing Wang
*** Jessie Buckley – Wicked Little Letters as Rose Gooding
*** Danielle Deadwyler – The Piano Lesson as Berniece

|-

! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%"| Best Original Screenplay

| valign="top" |
* 'Anora – Sean Baker'
** Runner-up: Challengers – Justin Kuritzkes
*** Love Lies Bleeding – Rose Glass and Weronika Tofilska

*** The Substance – Coralie Fargeat
|-

*** Sing Sing
*** Wicked
| valign="top" |

** Runner-up: Michael Keaton – Beetlejuice Beetlejuice as Betelgeuse
*** Ryan Gosling – The Fall Guy as Colt Seavers

* 'Wicked – Nathan Crowley'
** Runner-up: Nosferatu – Craig Lathrop and Beatrice Brentnerova

* Nicholas Hoult – Juror No. 2, Nosferatu, The Order, and The Garfield Movie
